name: Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM
author: RedefiningTheWeb

sections.description:
Make a smart move with PRO Version of Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM

AFFILIATE PROGRAM

Affiliate marketing has come to be known as something that happens online. You click a link, which directs you to a page or a product online, and then the link owner gets paid a small amount for that click. But it can also refer to things like when a mechanic gives a customer a discount for referring them to a new customer. The person who is doing the referring is getting paid by getting a discount towards their purchase. It is the same concept, just in the real world.

Affiliate marketing is a popular tactic to drive sales and generate significant online revenue. You can go with our program Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM if you are looking to promote your products or services.

Because affiliate marketing works by spreading the responsibilities of product marketing and creation across parties, it manages to leverage the abilities of a variety of individuals for a more effective marketing strategy while providing contributors with a share of the profit. To make this work, three different parties must be involved:

*Seller and product creators.
*The affiliate or advertiser.
*The consumer.

Affilia: WORDPRESS AFFILIATE PLUGIN WITH MLM

** Affilia – Affiliate Program With MLM** helps you to market your products through your affiliate team and through which you can generate more income from your eCommerce site by having more visibility and higher traffic.

One of the benefits of Affiliate marketing is paying commission for referred business links, or money earned from a combination of ad clicks, and referral traffic. Affiliate marketing is mutually beneficial for both parties.

With our Plugin, you can run an AFFILIATE SYSTEM with MLM(Multilevel marketing) on your web store. By rewarding your Affiliates with different types of commission and bonus. By this, you will surely reach the next level with INCREASED SALES. Your products will be marketed through different SOCIAL MEDIA platforms. As a result, your site will get HIGHER TRAFFIC with all these features. You just have to install our plugin and sit back and relax with your friends/family.

Multi Level Marketing ( MLM )

You can choose any of the MLM Matrix from Binary, Forced Matrix and Unilevel and start earning money through your MLM members. You can set number of child’s and levels of MLM chain. You can even set commission for each level. Add multilevel marketing strategy to your affiliate program so that your affiliate will generate new leads which will increase the sale amount even furthermore with the help of 3 Multi level Marketing Matrix – Binary MLM, Forced Matrix MLM, Unilevel MLM

KEY FEATURES

  • Unlimited Affiliates
    Create as many affiliates as you want to promote your products.

  • Advanced Affiliate Tools
    These tools help the affiliates to market your products easily and effectively.

  • Own Referral
    Affiliate can generate commission by buying from his referral link also. That means it’s a win-win situation for you and your affiliates.

  • Transparency
    Provide transparency between Admin and Affiliate regarding referral requests.

  • Overview
    Check each and every detail about the referrals from our simple yet beautiful dashboard section.

    • [Premium] The ability to expand your affiliate marketing with MLM, level base marketing, Direct bank Payment, Create Custom Banner and much more useful feature. Explore more by visit here and SOCIAL MEDIA SHARE extensions.

Premium Features

WordPress & WooCommerce Affiliate Program – Advanced, Fast, Easy, Highly Functional, Robust Plugin for WordPress Websites The WordPress & WooCommerce Affiliate Program is a premium plugin for automated Affiliate Marketing using the concept of Multi-Level Marketing.visit here

Key Features:

  • Unlimited Affiliates – Create as many affiliates as you want to promote your products.
  • MLM – Multi-Level Marketing to boost your income by generating new leads through affiliates.
  • Signup Bonus – Get more users to your site by providing a signup bonus to Affiliates when someone REGISTER from their referral link.
  • Set Maximum Commission – You can set a maximum commission limit for a month so that you don’t need to pay your affiliate once that threshold limit is reached.
  • Coupons – Affiliates can generate coupons of their earning which can be applied while buying a product from your site.
  • Advanced Affiliate Tools – These tools help the affiliates to market your products easily and effectively.
  • Dynamic & Conditional Commission Rules – Commission on products can be set at 3 different levels.
    1. Per product
    1. Per category
    1. All Products
  • Own Referral – Affiliate can generate commission by buying from his own referral link also. That means it’s a win-win situation for you and your affiliate.
  • Different Commission Types – 3 different types of commission can be set to a specific product/ a category/ all products.
    1. Fixed Price Commission
    2. Percentage Commission
    3. Fixed + Percentage Commission
  • Different Shortcode Types – 3 different types of shortcodes can be used to provide a user-friendly interface.
    1. Affiliate Dashboard
    2. Affiliate Login
    3. Affiliate Register.
  • Transparency – Provide transparency between Admin and Affiliate regarding referral requests.
  • Referral Reject Message – You can provide Referral reject reason to Affiliate for better understanding and Affiliate can view the reason, why their referral request is rejected.
  • Notifications – You can send the latest commission details via email for different products/ categories with just a single click to all of your affiliates.
  • Referral Notification – After a successful referral, an email with all the commission details is sent to the affiliate.
  • Reset Password – Affiliate can set a password by clicking on (Reset Password) link that the affiliate gets after a successful registration.
  • Share on Social Media – With this functionality, an affiliate can share the product’s affiliate link on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Mail, Whatsapp.
  • Performance Bonus – Provide an extra incentive when the affiliate unlocks an achievement.
  • Withdrawal Fees – When you do payout with PayPal/ stripe they charge you a fee but don’t worry we got that covered too. Set the amount which you want to deduct from the affiliate’s total commission before making a final payment.
  • Overview – Check each and every detail about the referrals from our simple yet beautiful dashboard section.
  • Affiliate Verification – You can verify the user before they become an affiliate.
  • All Referral Links in one place – Affiliate can get all the Referral Links of a category in a single file by downloading CSV.
  • Paypal Payouts – Do multiple payouts with just a single click. All of your affiliates with PayPal account will get the payout with just a single click.
  • Stripe Payouts – Use Stripe’s payment gateway to pay US affiliates.
  • Banner Generation – Affiliate can generate product banner that they can directly use on their marketing platforms.
  • Link Generation – Affiliates can create a referral link for any product with just a few clicks.
  • QR code – Referral links can be shared through QR codes.
  • Opt-in – Affiliate has an option to opt-in for email notifications.

FURTHER READINGS

For more information about WordPress & WooCommerce Affiliate Program in documentation form visit here.

Follow Us

  • Our Official Website – https://redefiningtheweb.com/
  • Our Codecanyon Portfolio – https://codecanyon.net/user/redefiningtheweb/portfolio
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WooCommerce Order Coupon, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM ” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM Plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly, of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM Plugin and upload it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.changelog:
2.7.0 – 2024-02-19

  • Feature added to set commission for affiliates between a date range
  • Feature added to see the name of member through which affiliate receive commission
  • Improve the Woocommerce HPOS feature
  • Minor bug fixes

2.6.0 – 2024-01-04

  • Improve Affiliate link generation workflow
  • Improve the design of custom banner tab
  • Minor bug fixes

2.5.0 – 2023-11-04

  • Compatibility with WooCommerce HPOS
  • Enhanced User Security issues
  • Compatible with WordPress 8.2.1
  • Compatible with WordPress 6.3.2
  • Minor bug fixes

2.4.0 – 2023-08-22

  • Improve the commission generation workflow.
  • Fix issue at the Dashboard Overview tab.
  • Fix the bug on approve commission.
  • Compatible with WordPress 6.3.0.
  • Minor bug fixes.

2.3.0 – 2023-04-29

  • Introduced Customize email feature for affiliates.
  • Compatible with latest version of php, wordpress and woocommerce.
  • Minor bug fixes.

2.2.0 – 2022-11-24

  • Introduced Rank feature option in the “Extra Feature” Tab.
  • Add Paystack Payment option for payout in the “Extra Feature => Payment” Tab.
  • Minor bug fixed.

2.1.1 – 2022-07-30

  • Introduced wp-user option for “Affiliate” Tab.
  • Compatible with WordPress 6.0.1.
  • Minor bug fixed.

2.1.0 – 2022-02-02

  • Introduced Notification option for “Extra Features” Tab.
  • Introduced Coupons for Affiliates.
  • Minor bug fixed.

2.0.2 – 2021-08-25

  • Introduced product wise fixed and percentage commission.
  • Minor bug fixed.
  • Tested up to WP 5.7.1

2.0.1 – 2021-06-26

  • Introduce “Title for Button” for this user can change the title according to them.
  • Introduce “Benefits for being an Affiliate” for this user can change the heading according to them.
  • Minor bug fixed

2.0.0 – 2021-05-06

  • Introduce MLM concept now affiliate parent will get MLM commission on every sale made by Affiliate.
  • Introduce percentage commission option for “Commission per Product”.
  • Introduce percentage commission option for “Commission for All Products”.
  • Minor bug fixed
  • Tested up to WP 5.7.1

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Admin Dashboard you can see information about income generated by your affiliates .

  2. Manage your Affiliates .

  3. Setting up Commission.

  4. Set Level wise Commission .

  5. All Referral link generated by affiliates .

  6. Different Payment method to Pay affiliate.

  7. Extra Feature Setting.

  8. Manage MLM Setting to generate the chain according to you.

  9. Affiliate Dashboard Section here affiliate can view all their earnings and get update about their referral request.

  10. Affiliate Commission Section describe all the commission set by admin.

  11. Tool Tab allow affiliate to generate link of their choice of product and also generate custom banner.

  12. Affiliate Download Section allow you to get CVV of different categories.

  13. In payout section an affiliate can choose their payment option.

  14. Affiliate Profile Section show details of affiliate.

  15. Affiliate MLM Section shows that Plan and the commission set on the different level by Admin.
sections.reviews:
'High-Performance order storage', it shouldn't be activated

By spyngr on December 14, 2023

How do we solve this?

⚠ This plugin is incompatible with the enabled WooCommerce feature 'High-Performance order storage', it shouldn't be activated. Manage WooCommerce features

Affilia Lite – Affiliate Program With MLM

By inhabitant on July 30, 2022

We first purchased the plugin, then decided to add additional features for better performance of our business, which team that created the plugin, RedefiningTheWeb gladly helped us implement it into the system. They are very correct and they did everything we additionally asked. Plugin and its functionalities work great and are an essential part of our business. Thank you RedefiningTheWeb for a great job and excellent cooperation.

Amazing Support!

By mardavikia on May 14, 2022

Great support even on the free plugin

Great code and great customer support

By crazyoptionstrading on May 12, 2022

Great code and great customer support I sincerely recommend it because I have not yet met with such support

Very good service

By lucianizecreative on May 10, 2022

Among so many plugins that I search online, I feel this is the best, easy to use, most of my clients like it very much, and their support is very very helpful, they can help you fix your issue (provided if it is reasonable), now all my client when they need affiliate plugin, I will promote affilia to them, good value, good service and fast response

Great support!

By mariog3 on April 5, 2022

I purchased the plugin over 2 months ago. During this time, I needed a lot of changes to suit my system. The support turned out to be invaluable. I sincerely recommend it because I have not yet met with such support. Congratulations and thank you again.

Excellent

By sarahibraheem on July 12, 2021

Excellent

Dúvidas de atualização do sistema

By luapmartins on April 21, 2021

Gostaria de saber qual foi a última atualização do sistema porque no site da empresa mostra que foi em 2019, e aqui no WP diz que foi há dois meses.

Customizable and easy to use.

By divang on February 16, 2021

Fantastic plugin and very easy to use. The support provided by the author is amazing they customized the plugin according to my need. Thanks, guys.

The best

By jeanvictoriaeraya on September 14, 2020

The best plugin and customer service
